ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: I know that God forgives me.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: I often feel that no matter what I do now I will never make up for the mistakes I have made in the past.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: I find it hard to forgive myself for some of the things I have done.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: You have forgiven those who have hurt you.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: Knowing that I am forgiven for my sins gives me strength to face my faults and be a better person.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: When someone has hurt you, you try to get even in some way.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: When you have hurt someone you often ask the other persons forgiveness.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: The people who committed violations against you/your family during the war have been punished enough.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: When you think about everything that has happened since the end of the war you believe that overall, the wrongs have been put right.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with these statements: I feel I have been punished enough for the things I did during the war.
Notes: 0=Strongly Disagree; 1=Somewhat Disagree; 2=Somewhat Agree; 3=Strongly Agree; 98=Don't Know; 99=No answer
